```{r setup}
library(tidyecon)

library(microbenchmark)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ezplot)
library(forcats)

```

```{r data setup}

x = as.matrix(cbind(intercept = 1, mtcars[c("cyl", "hp", "disp")]))
y = mtcars[["mpg"]]
w = rep(1, nrow(x))

```

```{r run benchmarking}

bm = microbenchmark(
  lm_fit(x, y),
  lm_fit(x, y, w),
  lm.fit(x, y),
  lm.wfit(x, y, w),
  times = 100
)

```


```{r chart, fig.height = 2, fig.width = 4}
bm$expr = fct_reorder(bm$expr, bm$time) %>% fct_rev()

ggplot(bm) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x = expr, 
                   y = time / 1e6, 
                   group = expr)) +
  scale_y_log10("time (milliseconds)",
                labels = ez_labels) +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_ez(10)
```
